Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Levofloxacin (0.25-16 µg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with levofloxacin antimicrobial susceptibility testing for streptococcal isolates
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility (MIC) of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture, including addition of levofloxacin (0.25-16 μg/mL) to Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels.
